author: Paul Kasabian
title: Chad Ochocinco Plays Madden NFL 20 with Fans Online Through EA's 'Stay & Play'
description: Former  NFL  wide receiver Chad Ochocinco faced five opponents in Madden NFL 20 as part of EA's  #StayAndPlay campaign to   ask people to stay home and play video games during the   COVID-19 pandemic...
content:
Thearon W. Henderson/Getty Images
Former NFL wide receiver Chad Ochocinco faced five opponents in Madden NFL 20 as part of EA's #StayAndPlay campaign to ask people to stay home and play video games during the COVID-19 pandemic.
